Adding strategy to the chart

Now that you have access to our strategies, the easiest way to use them is by clicking on the strategy you want to work with. After selecting the strategy, it will take a few seconds to load, and then you will see it on the chart.
Each strategy will have a list of properties that you can adjust, and you will see the results changing in real-time.

Manuel strategies

We also offer some manual trend strategies that require you to manually select the time and price points to determine where to draw the trendline.
The video below provides instructions on how to do this.

Add to favorite

For convenient access to your favorite strategies, you can add them to your favorites list and access them quickly.
